adversaries.name: Skeleton Warrior
abilities: Bone Strike: Melee attack dealing 2d6+2 physical damage
Reassemble: Once per encounter, regain 1d6 HP when reduced to 0

adversaries.name: Skeleton Archer
abilities: Arrow Volley: Ranged attack dealing 2d6+1 physical damage
Bone Shield: Reaction - reduce incoming damage by 2

adversaries.name: Crimson Ooze
abilities: Engulf: Melee attack dealing 2d8 acid damage. On hit, target is grappled
Split: When reduced to half HP, split into two smaller oozes with 4 HP each
Acid Trail: Leaves acidic residue that deals 1d4 damage to creatures that step in it
